la.matrix

Class SparseMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • la.matrix.SparseMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Matrix

    public class SparseMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix, java.io.Serializable
    A Java implementation of sparse matrices with combined compressed sparse column (CSC) and compressed sparse row (CSR). The advantage is that efficient operations can be obtained either by columns or by rows.
    Version:
    1.0 Dec. 6th, 2013
    Author:
    Mingjie Qian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] ic
      Column index array.
      private int[] ir
      Row index array.
      private int[] jc
      First entry index for each column.
      private int[] jr
      First entry index for each row.
      private int M
      Number of rows.
      private int N
      Number of columns.
      private int nnz
      Number of non-zero entries in this sparse matrix.
      private int nzmax
      Maximal number of non-zero entries in this sparse matrix.
      private double[] pr
      Pointer to the non-zero value array.
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      private int[] valCSRIndices
      Ordered value indices when converting CSC to CSR, i.e., the k-th non-zero value of a CSR sparse matrix is the valCSRIndices[k]-th non-zero value of a CSC sparse matrix.

      • SparseMatrix

        public SparseMatrix(int[] rIndices,
            int[] cIndices,
            double[] values,
            int numRows,
            int numColumns)
        Create a sparse matrix from index and value arrays.
        Parameters:
        rIndices - a 1D int array of row indices for non-zero elements
        cIndices - a 1D int array of column indices for non-zero elements
        values - a 1D double array of non-zero elements
        numRows - number of rows
        numColumns - number of columns

                              int numRows,
                              int numColumns)
        Create a sparse matrix from a map from index pairs to values.

        numRows - number of rows
        numColumns - number of columns
        Returns:

      • createSparseMatrix

        public static SparseMatrix createSparseMatrix(int[] rIndices,
                              int[] cIndices,
                              double[] values,
                              int numRows,
                              int numColumns,
                              int nzmax)
        Create a sparse matrix from index and value arrays.
        Parameters:
        rIndices - a 1D int array of row indices for non-zero elements
        cIndices - a 1D int array of column indices for non-zero elements
        values - a 1D double array of non-zero elements
        numRows - number of rows
        numColumns - number of columns
        nzmax - maximal number of non-zero elements
        Returns:
        a sparse matrix

      • createSparseMatrixByCSCArrays

        public static SparseMatrix createSparseMatrixByCSCArrays(int[] ir,
                                         int[] jc,
                                         double[] pr,
                                         int M,
                                         int N,
                                         int nzmax)
        Create a sparse matrix with the compressed sparse column format.
        Parameters:
        ir - a 1D int array of row indices for non-zero elements
        jc - a 1D int array of number of non-zero elements in each column
        pr - a 1D double array of non-zero elements
        M - number of rows
        N - number of columns
        nzmax - maximal number of non-zero entries
        Returns:
        a sparse matrix

      • createSparseMatrixByCSRArrays

        public static SparseMatrix createSparseMatrixByCSRArrays(int[] ic,
                                         int[] jr,
                                         double[] pr,
                                         int M,
                                         int N,
                                         int nzmax)
        Create a sparse matrix with the compressed sparse column format using compressed sparse row information.
        Parameters:
        ic - a 1D int array of column indices for non-zero elements
        jr - a 1D int array of number of non-zero elements in each row
        pr - a 1D double array of non-zero elements
        M - number of rows
        N - number of columns
        nzmax - maximal number of non-zero entries
        Returns:
        a sparse matrix

      • deleteEntry

        private void deleteEntry(int r,
               int c,
               int pos)
        Delete the entry indexed by (r, c) whose index of pr is pos.
        Parameters:
        r - row index of the entry to be deleted
        c - column index of the entry to be deleted
        pos - index in pr of the (r, c) entry
